Class BoundingCylinderTissueInput

Namespace
Vts.MonteCarlo.Tissues
Assembly
Vts.dll

Implements ITissueInput. Defines input to BoundingCylinderTissue class which is comprised of multilayer tissue bounded laterally by vertical cylinder

public class BoundingCylinderTissueInput : TissueInput, ITissueInput

Constructors

BoundingCylinderTissueInput()

BoundingCylinderTissueInput default constructor provides homogeneous tissue with bounding cylinder with radius 0.5mm and center (0,0,1)

public BoundingCylinderTissueInput()

BoundingCylinderTissueInput(ITissueRegion, ITissueRegion[])

allows definition of tissue bounded by capless cylinder height of tissue

public BoundingCylinderTissueInput(ITissueRegion caplessCylinderRegion, ITissueRegion[] layerRegions)
